script.lang: INSERT INTO dg_module_instance (module_instance_id, module_name, module_instance, permitted, num_of_items_in_teaser, site_id, real_instance_id) SELECT nextval('dg_module_instance_seq'), 'gpi', 'default', true, 1, s.id, null from dg_site s where inherit_security = true and invisible = false;
